dao.name: QRY_SHIP_DT_ROUND_NOS
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_dt_round_nos') as ship_dt_round_nos from dual

dao.name: QRY_SHIP_MN_ROUND_NOS
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_mn_round_nos') as ship_mn_round_nos from dual

dao.name: QRY_SHIP_UNIT_ROUND
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_unit_round') as ship_unit_round from dual

dao.name: QRY_CONTACT_COD
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'contact_cod') as contact_cod from dual

dao.name: QRY_SHIP_WHOUSE_COD
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_whouse_cod') as ship_whouse_cod from dual

dao.name: QRY_SHIP_ADD_COD
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'ship_add_cod') as ship_add_cod from dual

dao.name: QRY_ORDER_DAT_CHANGE_TIME
dao.statement: select pg_ais.sf_get_comp_sval(:comp_cod, 'SH', 'order_dat_change_time') as order_dat_change_time from dual
